greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Write n in binary; a(n) = number represented by second block of 1's from the right.
program: (PARI) { a(n) = local(b,l,r,c); b=binary(n); l=length(b); while(l&&b[l]==0,l--); while(l&&b[l]==1,l--); while(l&&b[l]==0,l--); r=0; c=0; while(l&&b[l],r+=2^c;l--;c++); r; } for(i=0,200,print1(a(i),",")) (Klasen)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 22 2003
ext: More terms from _David Wasserman_ and Lambert Klasen (Lambert.Klasen(AT)gmx.net), Sep 09 2005
